headline: LEN Stock Up 23% in Past 3 Months: Should You Buy, Hold or Sell Now?
summary: With Lennar stock up 23% in 3 months but margins pressured by affordability challenges, is it time to buy or wait?

headline: Should You Invest in PulteGroup (PHM) Based on Bullish Wall Street Views?
summary: The average brokerage recommendation (ABR) for PulteGroup (PHM) is equivalent to a Buy. The overly optimistic recommendations of Wall Street analysts make the effectiveness of this highly sought-after metric questionable. So, is it worth buying the stock?
